info.powah.gen.mode.desc:
The reactor will stop when is full and start 
when has less than 70% of energy.
jei.powah.player_aerial_pearl: Use an Aerial Pearl on Zombie or Husk.
jei.powah.binding_card_dim: Use a Binding card on Enderman or Endermite.
jei.powah.lens_of_ender: Use a Photoelectric Pane on Enderman or Endermite.
chat.powah.not.enough.blocks: 沒有足夠的方塊! 你需要更多%s !
wiki.powah.furnator_0: The Furnator is an FE generator that generates energy from solid Furnace fuel like coal, wood ...
wiki.powah.furnator_1: High tiers generate more FE/t and it has higher energy output, also they burn the fuel faster with the same energy gained per fuel tick.
wiki.powah.magmator_0: The Magmator is an FE generator that generates energy from high temp fluids like Lava.
wiki.powah.magmator_1: High tiers generate more FE/t and it has higher energy output, also they burn the fuel faster with the same energy gained per fuel tick.
wiki.powah.thermo_generator_0: The Thermo Generator is an FE generator that generates energy when placed on top of a high temp block/fluid like lava, require a coolant fluid like water to run.
wiki.powah.solar_panel_0: The Solar Panel is an FE generator that generates energy when exposed to sunlight, high tiers generates more FE/t, any block that stop light above the Solar panel will stop its production.
wiki.powah.reactor_0: The Reactor is a multi-block (FE) generator that use Uraninite as main fuel.
wiki.powah.reactor_1: To build it you will need 36 Reactor block in your hand and placing them in a 3X4 replaceable area, then the reactor will complete building itself automatically.
wiki.powah.reactor_2: When Generating energy the reactor heats up causing it to consume fuel faster and generating less FE/t, so you need to cool it down using a coolant like water, also you can use a solid coolant like snow or ice for extra coldness, solid coolant require liquid coolant to work.
wiki.powah.reactor_3: Keep the reactor buffer full of fuel for better production.
wiki.powah.reactor_4: Carbon materials like coal, wood..., will improve the fuel efficiency and will add +180 C of heat.
wiki.powah.reactor_5: Redstone will speed up the production and the fuel consumption and will add +120 C of heat.
wiki.powah.reactor_6: The reactor will stop when is full and start when has less than 70% of energy if the auto mode is on.
wiki.powah.energy_cell_0: The Energy Cell its a block used to store energy (FE).
wiki.powah.energy_cell_1: Can Also be used to add capacity to an Ender Network channel by Shift-clicking it to an Ender Cell GUI, if the Energy Cell contains energy then will also be applied to the ender network channel.
wiki.powah.ender_cell_0: The Ender Cell its a block used to store energy (FE) to a specific channel of the ender network of the owner.
wiki.powah.ender_cell_1: You can access the energy stored of a selected channel from anywhere in the world if the Ender Cell that you want to transfer power from/to have an active channel with a valid capacity.
wiki.powah.ender_cell_2: You can add capacity to a selected channel by shift-clicking an Energy Cell or Battery to the Ender Cell GUI.
wiki.powah.ender_cell_3: The amount added is the same of the item you've added, max capacity a channel can have is 9E FE.
wiki.powah.energy_cable_0: Cables are used to transfer power between machines.
wiki.powah.energy_cable_1: You can change transfer mode of by right-clicking a cable using <powah:wrench> with Config mode selected.
wiki.powah.ender_gate_0: Transfer energy between the adjacent block and the ender network.
wiki.powah.ender_gate_1: Unlike the Ender cell you can not Upgrade the network from it.
wiki.powah.energizing_0: The Energizing Orb its a block used to energize items, require at least one Energizing Rod in range of %s to work, the energizing speed depends on amount of rods and the rod tier (I/O rate).
wiki.powah.energizing_1: The orb does not require energy but the rods must be placed on cables or any Forge Energy (FE) block to work.
wiki.powah.energizing_2: When placing the orb/rod in range will automatically link to each other, also you can use the <powah:wrench> with Link mode to re-link them.
wiki.powah.player_transmitter_0: The Player Transmitter its a block used to charge items wirelessly in linked player inventory including armor slots and off-hand anywhere in the same dimension when has a normal binding card and across dimensions when has a dimensional binding card.
wiki.powah.energy_discharger_0: The Energy Discharger its a block used to drain energy (FE) out of charged items and then store it to an internal buffer if then connected via cables to extract that stored power and re-using it again.
wiki.powah.energy_hopper_0: The Energy Hopper its a block used to charge chargeable items inside an adjacent inventory like a chest or any block with an accessible inventory and not a not has forge energy.
wiki.powah.wrench_1: Config Mode: used to change cables I/O configuration.
wiki.powah.wrench_2: Link Mode: used to link linkable blocks like energizing orb and rods.
wiki.powah.wrench_3: Rotate Mode: used to rotate blocks horizontally.
wiki.powah.battery_0: Charge items when is in player inventory, can Also be used to upgrade the capacity of a Ender Network channel by Shift clicking a Battery to an Ender Cell GUI, if the Battery contain energy then will also be applied to the ender network channel.
wiki.powah.player_aerial_pearl_0: Player Aerial Pearl used to craft the player transmitter.
wiki.powah.player_aerial_pearl_1: You can get it by using an Aerial Pearl on a Zombie or Husk.
wiki.powah.binding_card_0: Binding Card used to link a player with a Player Transmitter in the same dimension.
wiki.powah.binding_card_1: You need to link it with you before adding it to the player transmitter, Right-click it to bind.
wiki.powah.binding_card_dim_0: Dimensional Binding Card used to link a player with a Player Transmitter across dimensions.
wiki.powah.binding_card_dim_1: You need to link it with you before adding it to the player transmitter, Right-click it to bind.
wiki.powah.charged_snowball_0: Throwing a Charged Snowball will cause a bolt of lightning to spawn when hitting the ground or when it hits the mob, obtained by energizing a snowball.
wiki.powah.lens_of_ender_0: When Applying a Lens Of Ender to a Solar Panel will make it see through blocks.
wiki.powah.uraninite_0: Uraninite Ore is an ore rarely found underground at levels 1 - 64 for poor, at levels 1 - 32 for the normal, and at levels 1 - 16 for dense, and is found in 1 - 4 block deposits.
wiki.powah.uraninite_1: An iron or better pickaxe is needed to mine it, and when mined it will drop 1 piece of Raw Uraninite based on the ore type (the amount dropped are effected by fortune).
wiki.powah.dry_ice_0: Dry Ice used mainly to cool down reactors, it can be found underground at levels 1 - 64, you can also obtain it by energizing two pieces of blue ice.
